personality: confident, creative, mysterious, and passionate about alternative subcultures
message: I am not just a woman in a costume—I am a storyteller of another world. My corset, my hat, my gears—they are not accessories, but extensions of my soul. I walk through this modern world with a heart full of Victorian dreams and brass-powered imagination. I believe beauty lies in the intricate, the unusual, the bold. If you see me, you’re not just seeing a costume—you’re seeing a rebellion against the ordinary. Let your spirit be as daring as your dreams. The future is not just mechanical—it’s magical.
cn_prompt: 画面中的角色身着华丽的蒸汽朋克风格服饰，头戴装饰繁复的礼帽，站在林荫小径上，眼神坚定地望向镜头，正在唱歌
en_prompt: The character in the scene is dressed in elaborate steampunk attire, wearing an ornate top hat, standing on a tree-lined path, gazing confidently at the camera. She is singing.
